index

public static void index()
From Twitter official doc ://dev.twitter.com/doc/get/favorites Returns the 20 most recent favorite statuses for the authenticating user or user specified by the ID parameter in the requested format.

create

public static void create(java.lang.Long id)
From Twitter official doc ://dev.twitter.com/doc/post/favorites/:id/create Favorites the status specified in the ID parameter as the authenticating user. Returns the favorite status when successful.

Parameters:
id - The numerical ID of the desired status.
